live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 06:34 MT.
61285.summary: Some customers in Fort MacLeod are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
61285.title: May 17 - Fort MacLeod | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
